description: The Access-Control-Request-Private-Network: true and Access-Control-Allow-Private-Network: true HTTP request and response headers establish permission for websites to make requests to internal networks, such as to routers.
description_html: The Access-Control-Request-Private-Network: true and Access-Control-Allow-Private-Network: true HTTP request and response headers establish permission for websites to make requests to internal networks, such as to routers.

discouraged.reason: Private network access caused compatibility problems and is superseded by local network access.
discouraged.reason_html: Private network access caused compatibility problems and is superseded by local network access.

name: Private network access
